[ library(ic_sets) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

get_set_attribute(?Set, -Attr)

Get the set-attribute corresponding to Set
Set
A ground set or a set variable
Attr
A variable, will be bound to a set-attribute structure

Description

Gets the set-attribute of a set-variable (or computes an attribute structure describing a ground set as if it was a variable).
